title: Margery

| - | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
|   | A lithe spellcaster in service to the powers of Hell; it is her duty to ensure that the inhabitants of the Dungeon never forget their place. She personally slew the ancient dragon from whose hide her strange armour is crafted. |

## Contents

- [1 Useful Info](#Useful_Info)
- [2 Location](#Location)
- [3 Spells](#Spells)
- [4 Tips & Tricks](#Tips_.26_Tricks)
- [5 History](#History)

## Useful Info

**Margery the Dragonslayer** is a [unique](/Unique "Unique") [fire elementalist](/Fire_elementalist "Fire elementalist"), usually accompanied by a few [hell knights](/Hell_knight "Hell knight"), a [hellephant](/Hellephant "Hellephant") or [searing wretch](/Searing_wretch "Searing wretch"), and a [deep elf high priest](/Deep_elf_high_priest "Deep elf high priest") or a [deep elf death mage](/Deep_elf_death_mage "Deep elf death mage"). She wears a suit of [fire](/Fire_dragon_scales "Fire dragon scales"), [shadow](/Shadow_dragon_scales "Shadow dragon scales"), or [storm dragon scales](/Storm_dragon_scales "Storm dragon scales").

[Maggie](/Maggie "Maggie") is another unique who is a younger version of Margery. Margery and Maggie are mutually exclusive; if one appears in a game, the other will not.

## Location

- [The Depths](/The_Depths "The Depths"):3-4
- [The Vaults](/The_Vaults "The Vaults"):2-5
- [The Crypt](/The_Crypt "The Crypt")

## Spells

| Spell set I |                                                     |                                                     |
| :---------- | --------------------------------------------------- | --------------------------------------------------- |
| Slot1       | [Bolt of Fire](/Bolt_of_Fire "Bolt of Fire") (3d32) | [Wizard flag](/Spell_slot_flags "Spell slot flags") |
| Slot2       | [Fireball](/Fireball "Fireball") (3d33)             | [Wizard flag](/Spell_slot_flags "Spell slot flags") |

## Tips & Tricks

- As both Margery and her associates will be pelting you with [Fire Magic](/Fire_Magic "Fire Magic") as long as you're in sight, [fire resistance](/Fire_resistance "Fire resistance") is a must. Her Fireballs can brutalize the unprepared.
- If you're capable of dealing [cold](/Cold "Cold") damage, use it on her. She never has cold resistance, and sometimes her armour makes her vulnerable to it.
- If you encounter hell knights in either the Depths, the Vaults, or the Crypt, there's a very good chance that Margery is close by, especially if you also see a hellephant, a searing wretch, and/or a deep elf high priest or death mage. Separate individuals from the pack as best you can, and escape if it seems like you'll have to tackle them all at once.
- Be sure to examine the equipment of Margery's pack. Hell knights often carry excellent weaponry, and Margery herself has a small chance of generating holding a somewhat pre-enchanted [Wyrmbane](/Wyrmbane "Wyrmbane").

## History

- Prior to [0.31](/0.31 "0.31"), Margery was only accompanied by hell knights, and there were two more hell knights in her band.
- Prior to [0.25](/0.25 "0.25"), she could spawn with [acid](/Acid_dragon_scales "Acid dragon scales") or [swamp dragon scales](/Swamp_dragon_scales "Swamp dragon scales"), rather than shadow or storm. She also did not have a chance of spawning with Wyrmbane.
- Prior to [0.11](/0.11 "0.11"), she did not generate with dragon armour.

Margery

From CrawlWiki
Jump to: navigation, search
Version 0.31: This article may not be up to date for the latest stable release of Crawl.
Margery @ 
HP 108-220
HD 22
XP 5115
Speed 10
AC 9
EV 8
Will 140
Attack1 30 (hit: plain)


Resistances None
Vulnerabilities None
Habitat Land
Intelligence Human
Uses Weapons & armour
Starting equipment
Open doors
Holiness Natural
Size Medium
Type human, human
Flags See invisible
Speaks
Warm-blooded
Unique
Female
A lithe spellcaster in service to the powers of Hell; it is her duty to ensure that the inhabitants of the Dungeon never forget their place. She personally slew the ancient dragon from whose hide her strange armour is crafted.

Contents

  • 1 Useful Info
  • 2 Location
  • 3 Spells
  • 4 Tips & Tricks
  • 5 History

Useful Info

Margery the Dragonslayer is a unique fire elementalist, usually accompanied by a few hell knights, a hellephant or searing wretch, and a deep elf high priest or a deep elf death mage. She wears a suit of fire, shadow, or storm dragon scales.

Maggie is another unique who is a younger version of Margery. Margery and Maggie are mutually exclusive; if one appears in a game, the other will not.

Location

  • The Depths:3-4
  • The Vaults:2-5
  • The Crypt

Spells

Spell set I
Slot1 Bolt of Fire (3d32) Wizard flag
Slot2 Fireball (3d33) Wizard flag

Tips & Tricks

  • As both Margery and her associates will be pelting you with Fire Magic as long as you're in sight, fire resistance is a must. Her Fireballs can brutalize the unprepared.
  • If you're capable of dealing cold damage, use it on her. She never has cold resistance, and sometimes her armour makes her vulnerable to it.
  • If you encounter hell knights in either the Depths, the Vaults, or the Crypt, there's a very good chance that Margery is close by, especially if you also see a hellephant, a searing wretch, and/or a deep elf high priest or death mage. Separate individuals from the pack as best you can, and escape if it seems like you'll have to tackle them all at once.
  • Be sure to examine the equipment of Margery's pack. Hell knights often carry excellent weaponry, and Margery herself has a small chance of generating holding a somewhat pre-enchanted Wyrmbane.

History

  • Prior to 0.31, Margery was only accompanied by hell knights, and there were two more hell knights in her band.
  • Prior to 0.25, she could spawn with acid or swamp dragon scales, rather than shadow or storm. She also did not have a chance of spawning with Wyrmbane.
  • Prior to 0.11, she did not generate with dragon armour.
Retrieved from "http://crawl.chaosforge.org/index.php?title=Margery&oldid=78880"

{{version031}}
{{monster info}}

==Useful Info==
'''Margery the Dragonslayer''' is a [[unique]] [[fire elementalist]], usually accompanied by a few [[hell knight]]s, a [[hellephant]] or [[searing wretch]], and a [[deep elf high priest]] or a [[deep elf death mage]]. She wears a suit of [[fire dragon scales|fire]], [[shadow dragon scales|shadow]], or [[storm dragon scales]].

[[Maggie]] is another unique who is a younger version of Margery. Margery and Maggie are mutually exclusive; if one appears in a game, the other will not.

==Location==
*[[The Depths]]:3-4
*[[The Vaults]]:2-5
*[[The Crypt]]

{{monster spells}}

==Tips & Tricks==
*As both Margery and her associates will be pelting you with [[Fire Magic]] as long as you're in sight, [[fire resistance]] is a must. Her Fireballs can brutalize the unprepared.
*If you're capable of dealing [[cold]] damage, use it on her. She never has cold resistance, and sometimes her armour makes her vulnerable to it.
*If you encounter hell knights in either the Depths, the Vaults, or the Crypt, there's a very good chance that Margery is close by, especially if you also see a hellephant, a searing wretch, and/or a deep elf high priest or death mage. Separate individuals from the pack as best you can, and escape if it seems like you'll have to tackle them all at once.
*Be sure to examine the equipment of Margery's pack. Hell knights often carry excellent weaponry, and Margery herself has a small chance of generating holding a somewhat pre-enchanted [[Wyrmbane]].

==History==
*Prior to [[0.31]], Margery was only accompanied by hell knights, and there were two more hell knights in her band.
*Prior to [[0.25]], she could spawn with [[acid dragon scales|acid]] or [[swamp dragon scales]], rather than shadow or storm. She also did not have a chance of spawning with Wyrmbane.
*Prior to [[0.11]], she did not generate with dragon armour.
